amendment.description: An amendment to provide for designated emergency funds for the State and Local Programs and for the Firefighter Assistance Grants.

action.text: Mr. Aderholt raised a point of order against the Lowey amendment (A024). Mr. Aderholt stated that the amendment seeks to amend portions of the bill not yet read for consideration. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mrs. Lowey.
